original_text: So the Israelites took their bread before they had cooked it. They had not even put the yeast into it. They put the bread in dishes and they put clothes round the dishes. Then they carried the dishes on their shoulders.
korean_text: 그 백성이 발교되지 못한 반죽 담은 그릇을 옷에 싸서 어깨에 메니라

sentences.original_text: So the Israelites took their bread
They had not even put the yeast into it
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 안에 누룩도 넣지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: They put the bread in dishes
and they put clothes round the dishes
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그릇 주위에 옷을 둘렀습니다

sentences.original_text: Then they carried the dishes on their shoulders
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 그들은 그릇을 어깨에 메고 다녔습니다
